title: Sydney Day 1- Drupal Tour 2016
body:
My first Day as a tourist in Sydney had a lot of activities at not all of them related with tourist.

My first one was in the offices of Technocrat HQ, where Vladimir Roudakov invite me to do a video interview to talk about tour, and of course, about Drupal Console be in contact to see the final cut soon.

For lunch, I met with Adam Malone who as usual is doing business travel, but he manages to have a meal with us just before to departure to Melbourne.

In the afternoon we walk in the Royal Botanic Gardens and of course, we ended up in the Mrs. Macquarieâ€™s Point to have the mandatory picture with the Opera House in the background.

A lot of people said that the State Library of NSW is a more beautiful building that their counterpart in Melbourne; but IMHO, the Melboure Victoria Library is more gorgeous.

In the library, we have the opportunity of seeing a World Press Photo 16 winners exposition.

After having a recovery nap in our hotel, we explore the city at night, because this week the [Vivid Sydney Festival](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vivid_Sydney] is happening, which is music, light and art festival around the city. The festival is breathtaking, and we could have the opportunity if took a lot of pictures.

Walking

Sydney (today) 19.213
Previously 1.375.461
Total 1.394.674
